text: Viersen is the capital of Viersen in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is about 8 km north-west of MÃ¶nchengladbach, 15 km south-west of Krefeld and 20 km east of Venlo (Netherlands). == Twin towns == Viersen is twinned with: * Calau, Germany * Kaniv, Ukraine * Lambersart, France * Mittweida, Germany * Pardesiya, Israel * Peterborough, England, United Kingdom == References == == Other websites == * Category:Viersen (district)
